0.name: Cave entrance
desc: You are standing in the cave entrance. It is very dark
downhere. There is writing at the wall. There is an exit
to the north. A stairway leads up.

exits.desc: To the north you can see a small tunnel.
You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

1.name: Cave tunnel
desc: You are walking in a tunnel. It is very cold. You
can feel the presence of a living thing ... SOMEWHERE.

exits.desc: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.
To the south tunnel continuing.

2.name: Cave room
desc: You are standing in a room. It's much cooler now.
The walls are glowing.

exits.desc: To the east you see the tunnel going downwards.
To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.

3.name: Cave T-cross
desc: You are standing in a mudlike substance. The smell here is
awful, it is rotten. To the west you can see some light.
When you examine the mud, you notice small worms crawling
around.

extra.desc: The worms are purple. They do not look edible.

exits.desc: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.
You can see some light to the west.

4.name: Cave turning-point
desc: The mud are getting deeper. You are wondering, 'Would
it be an idea to leave, before I disappear?'. To the
south you notice a flat round stone are blocking the
way. To the west you can see mud.
The stone looks very uninteresting. BUT as you are
about to turn away, you see a lightstribe coming
through a small hole. Conclusion: The stone is moveable.

exits.desc: You can see an opening behind the stone.

5.name: The secret room
desc: There is dust all over the place. It looks like nobody
has been here for ages. In the middle of the room you see
a socket with a crystal globe. The globe glows with a
pulsing light. To the north you see a stone door. To the
south you see a grey block.
The socket looks like the work of a dwarf. It is VERY
beautifull.
The crystal globe is glowing with a pulsing light. It
looks like there is smoke inside it.

exits.desc: You see a round stone door.
You see a grey block

6.name: The mudhole
desc: You are standing in a lot of mud. The mud goes to your
chest. You feel the precence of something IN the mud.
The only obivicios exit is to the west.

exits.desc: You can see nothing at all.

7.name: Tunnel
desc: The mud goes to your knees. Otherwise the tunnel looks
very normal.

exits.desc: You can see a mudhole.

8.name: The long tunnel
desc: Here There is almost no mud, as you stand at the top
of a small rock. Just beside you there are a sign which
says 'WARNING! The worms are dangerous!'.

exits.desc: You can see a lot of mud..Yarck!
The tunnel goes a little downwards.

9.name: The hot room
desc: You are very surprised, as this room for a change are
hot instead of cold. To the north it goes downwards into
some mud. There are also an exit to the west.

exits.desc: You see a lot of mud.
You see a entrance to a small room.

10.name: The small room
desc: As you look around you notice a small statue. There are
exits to the west and to the east.
This is a statue of a imp, pointing to the west. The imp
looks like a man with horns and a tail.

exits.desc: It is pitch dark out there.
You see a VERY long hallway.

11.name: The stalagmite cave
desc: You are standing in a stalagmite cave. Water is drippling
from the walls. It is very cold in here.

extra.desc: The stalagmites are very tall, and looks very beautiful.

exits.desc: You see a long hallway, and some mud.

12.name: The stalagmite tunnel
desc: You has entered a small tunnel. Here it is quite dry.
Mabye it would be an idea to rest here.

exits.desc: You can see a small cave to the north.

13.name: The spongy room
desc: "  You definately do NOT like this area.  It is very dank, and
most of the place is wet.

14.name: The stalagmite T-cross
desc: You are standing in a cross. To the north you can see
some light. Otherwise it is dark.

exits.desc: You see some light ahead.

15.name: The blind end room
desc: This room is obviously a blind end. To the north you see
a primitive picture.
You see some persons dancing around a huge sun. The
sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size
of the picture.

exits.desc: You see a primitive picture

16.name: The treasure room
desc: This room is rich ornamented. The walls has carves showing
persons dancing around a sun which is drawed at the floor. It
looks very old, and it is very dusty. To the south you see a
secret door.

17.name: The square lair
desc: You are standing in the south-east part of the lair. You can
see a skeleton lying at the wall.
It looks like a adventurer who was'nt lucky. You better
watch out-

exits.desc: Another part of the lair
Another part of the lair

18.name: The square lair
desc: You are standing in the north-east part of the lair. You see
a sign at the wall
The sign says 'Gods of War I call you, my sword is by my side,
I seek a light free from all false pride'
Reyemle Grug.....

exits.desc: You see a wooden door
another part of the lair.
another part of the lair.

19.name: The square lair
desc: You are standing in the north-west part of the lair. Here's
another sign. There are a exit from the lair to the north.
The sign says 'I'm wandering around in a everlasting tale,
seeking the light to regain my pride
Corama...

exits.desc: You see a small tunnel leading north.
another part of the lair.
another part of the lair.

20.name: The lair end
desc: "  You can see a table in front of you.  It's very dusty.
Around the table five skeletons are sitting.
On the tabel there is dust, in the center there is a small statue of a
Dragon sleeping.
it looks like a silver dragon. It is nailed onto the tabel.
The dragon sits on a red dragon that looks dead. But the
eyes of the red dragon is glowing pulsating red. You feel
drained.

exits.desc: the northern part of the lair.
the eastern part of the lair.

21.name: East tunnel
desc: You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east
and west. To the west you see a wooden door.

exits.desc: You can see a muddy tunnel.
You can see a wooden door.

22.name: North tunnel
22.desc: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.

exits.desc: The dark tunnel continues.
You can see the lair.
You can see a cave entrance.

23.name: The L-shaped room.
desc: You are standing in deep darkness. To the south there is a small exit.
To the east you can see a gaping hole.

24.name: The Circular hall.
desc: You are standing in round hall. To the north, east and south you
can see a stone head hanging on the walls.
When you study the faces of the heads you see that it
is faces of dragons. The face to the north is red, the
face to the east is green and the face to the south is
blue.

extra.desc: This looks like a good dragon

exits.desc: you see nothing special.
you see a room far away.

25.name: Dusty tunnel
desc: You are standing in dust. This place has not been
touched for a long time. Otherwise it is quite boring
here, looks like a place to rest! To the west you see
the outline of a door. A tunnel leads to the east.
You see a tunnel which leads downwards. It is quite
dark.
You can see the outline of a door. Just like in the
description!

26.name: The crossing
desc: You are standing in a crossing of hallways. You can leave this place
in every direction, except up and down. In the dust you notice strange
footprints.

extra.desc: You have never seen this kind of footprints before!

27.name: The L-shaped room
desc: You are standing in a L-shaped room. You can hear
noices from the long tunnel to the east. You can feel
fear! A sign is hanging on the wall.

exits.desc: a long dark tunnel.

28.name: Dragons lair
desc: You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red.
All kinds of bones are scattered all over the floor. On
the walls you can see some burned shapes. You smell burned
flesh. Two creatures are like melted into the floor.

exits.desc: You can see a long tunnel.
You can see nothing but darkness.

29.name: The burned room
desc: You are in a room, which once had been quite burned.
There is writing on the wall.

exits.desc: You can see a red glow

30.name: The wind tunnel
desc: You are standing in a tunnel. Above you, you can feel
a breeze.
The breeze comes from a hole above you. NO way to get up
there.

exits.desc: To dark to tell

31.name: The glittering room
desc: This room are all bright. In the walls you can see some
silver. Exits are: West, east and south.

extra.desc: The glittering silver looks like it is INSIDE the walls.

32.name: The secret passage room
desc: You have entered a tiny room. There is an exit down, and an
exit to the west.
A sign is blocking the way. It says 'This has not been
implementated yet....'

33.name: End of long tunnel
desc: You are at a end of a long tunnel. Right in front of you,
you can see a grey mass. To the east you can see a tremendous
long tunnel, but you know that, you has just been there.

extra.desc: The mass is nothing but a mass, but it is quite suspecious!

exits.desc: Long tunnel. JUST like in the description!
A grey mass is blocking the way.

34.name: Stair-room
desc: You are standing in a small room. Drawings of faces in pain
are on the walls. You can fell darkness is ruling the place.
there are two exits: south and down.

exits.desc: nothing but darkness

desc: A sign is blocking the way: 'This has not been implementated
yet'.

35.name: Dark tunnel
desc: You are standing in a dark tunnel. It continues to the north
and to the south. Bones are spred on the floor

extra.desc: it looks like bones of a human.

36.name: Entrance to lair
desc: The smell here is awfull. To the south you can see some
smoke. A tunnel leads north, and east.

exits.desc: A small cave is to the east.
the only thing you can see are smoke.

37.name: North-eastern part of Basilisks cave
desc: It is hard to see here because of the smoke. To the north you
can see barly see a small tunnel. Other exits are to the south
and to the west.

38.name: South-eastern part of basilisks cave
desc: There are a very small hole in wall, from where the smoke
are coming from. Otherwise it is pitch dark. Exits are north
and west.

extra.desc: It's a small hole. About 1 feet in diameter.

exits.desc: You can see nothing but smoke
You can see nothing but smoke

39.name: North-western part of basilisks cave
desc: You can see some hay spred on the floor. The smell is
awfull here, and it makes you feel sick. This place is
the place where the basilisk sleep. Watch out..Mabye it is not
far away.

extra.desc: The hay is very dirty. The smell of it makes you feel sick.

40.name: South-western part of basilisks cave
40.desc: You can see nothing but smoke.

41.name: The small cave
desc: You are standing in small cave. You can see
some light in the end. Exits are north and south.

exits.desc: You can see only smoke.
You can see a blue glow. And you feel a fresh breeze.

42.name: The northern end of the pool
desc: You have wet feet, you are standing in water.
The water looks calm. You can see that it's
a big lake. Light seeps from the water.

exits.desc: You can see a small cave.
You can see more water.
You can see water.

43.name: The pool
desc: You are swimming in water. It is getting deep here.
It is also dark in this end.

exits.desc: You can see some bubbles in the water.
You see calm water.

44.name: The south end of the pool
desc: You standing in water up to you neck.
You can only see water.

exits.desc: You can see calm water.
To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.

45.name: The pool
desc: You are swimming in DARKNESS. You feel something
touching your right leg.

exits.desc: To dark to tell.
You can feel a warm  breeze.
